DOC.brief_summary: The objective study establish tipranavir-ritonavir steady-state dose-exposure relationship administer b.i.d . dose regimen ; determine effect tipranavir ( TPV ) ritonavir ( RTV ) cytochrome P-450 ( CYP3A4 ) activity ; establish dependency TPV M1 metabolite RTV co-administration . Additionally , short-term safety tolerance drug combination evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Tipranavir Soft Elastic Capsules ( SEDDS ) Ritonavir Their Effects Cytochrome P-450 ( 3A4 ) Healthy Volunteers
